title: PB
description: The PB (petabyte) is a unit of digital information equal to 1,024 terabytes or 1,125,899,906,842,624 bytes.
content: The unit of digital information that equals 1,024 terabytes or 1,125,899,906,842,624 bytes. It's used to measure extremely large data storage capacities, typically in cloud data centers or large-scale data processing environments.
